author: jonl
msg: Factored out SharedResources class from Application and made some minor
improvements to the static path() methods.  This will clear the way to
make Session relative SharedResources in the future.  It also will enable
us to make changes to the SharedResources class without having to add
more methods to Application, which is already complex enough.

author: jdonnerstag
msg: removed static from markup cache. Classes cached in different application must not be the same.

author: jonl
msg: [ 1181988 ] Clarify ResourceReference constructor with no scope

author: sourceforge-skipoles
msg: Made inner classes static so that they can be serialized in the session even though the AutoLinkResolver class is not serializable
